SvcApptSchdEvent.name: SvcApptSchdEvent
SvcApptSchdEvent.description: Represents the service appointment event. This object is included in a streamed notification received on the channels for the parent platform events. You canâ€™t subscribe to the SvcApptSchdEvent channel directly.

AdditionalInformation.description: Additional information about the service appointment.

Address.description: The address of the service appointment.

ContactId.description: ID of the contact associated with the service appointment.

DurationInMinutes.description: The duration of the service appointment in minutes.

Email.description: The email associated with the service appointment.

EventUuid.description: A universally unique identifier (UUID) that identifies a platform event message. This field is available in API version 52.0 and later.

ParentRecordId.description: ID of the parent record associated with the service appointment.

Phone.description: The phone number associated with the service appointment.

ScheduledEndTime.description: The scheduled end time of the service appointment.

ScheduledStartTime.description: The scheduled start time of the service appointment.

ServiceTerritoryId.description: ID of the service territories associated with the service appointment.

Status.description: The status of the service appointment.

StatusCategory.description: The status category of the service appointment.

Subject.description: The subject of the service appointment.

WorkTypeBlockTimeAfterAppointment.description: The period of time occurring after the appointment that is typically blocked for this work type.

WorkTypeBlockTimeAfterUnit.description: The unit of the period specified for WorkTypeBlockTimeAfterAppointment. Values include hour and minute.

WorkTypeBlockTimeBeforeAppointment.description: The period of time occurring before the appointment that is typically blocked for this work type.

WorkTypeBlockTimeBeforeUnit.description: The unit of the period specified for WorkTypeBlockTimeBeforeAppointment. Values include hour and minute.

WorkTypeId.description: ID of the work type associated with the service appointment.
